backend/main.mo: Implements shipment tracking backend with authorization, user profiles, shipment creation, tracking events, and tracking number generation using AccessControl.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence reports linking features to modified files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of all frontend files for documentation or build-planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind setup and a warm OKLCH color palette for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with favicon and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router, global layout with header/footer, and routes for tracking and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Protects admin pages by checking Internet Identity authentication and admin role, showing appropriate UI states.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Header with branding, navigation to tracking and admin pages, and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/TrackingTimeline: Displays shipment tracking events in a chronological visual timeline with icons and details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor, handling identity-based configuration and autoâ€‘refetching dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: React Query hooks for admin actions like fetching roles, shipments, and creating shipments or tracking events.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context using Internet Identity, managing login state, identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useShipmentTracking.t: React Query hooks to fetch a shipment and its latest tracking event by tracking number.
frontend/src/index.css: Re-exports global CSS by importing the root index.css file.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin interface for creating shipments, generating tracking numbers, and adding tracking events.
frontend/src/pages/TrackShipmentPage.tsx: UI for users to search shipments by tracking number and view tracking details or errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme customization, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state for a courier tracking site with feature list and notes a missing accessible admin interface.
